content:
I've noticed that Claude Code has become noticeably slower and sometimes gets stuck for sometime. It used to be much more responsive earlier.

Is it just me or my environment/prompts/code or have others noticed it too? Compacting has no impact as far as I can tell.

If others have noticed it, could it be Anthropic throttling or just being stressed due to scaling issues?
